mapper.select: select * from member where email=#{email} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into member(email, password, birth_year, residence_state, residence_city, gender) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{birth_year}, #{residence_state}, #{residence_city}, #{gender});
mapper.update: update member set nickname=#{nickname} where email=#{email} and password=#{password}
